alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central San Miguel and east central San Juan Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Monticello, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello and Summit Point. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 70 and 85. U.S. Highway 491 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 7. Colorado 141 between mile markers 8 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
